channel.title: Advertise section
channel.description: Idk it has come to my attention that people post forums link and stuff etc without permission, but why can't we make a section were people can show off there server and they advertise it. People can comment on it and rate it. So the owner knows what to fix. Just an idea! Don't tell at me :)

item.title: Advertise section
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

That, and these forums were made for the development of servers in the sense of furthering knowledge, not what should be changed or improved in ones server source to help further their “popularity”. Honestly, that’s all it would be utilized for.

This has been brought up multiple times-- enough to end the thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertise section
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:7, topic:431971”]Pain to moderate in the sense of spam and newcomers posting viruses.[/quote]Well, the status page doesn’t fix that second problem.

But yea, we have a server status page.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertise section
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

we had one and it was terrible

Pain to moderate in the sense of spam and newcomers posting viruses.

Read full topic

item.title: Advertise section
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:5, topic:431971”][quote author=kronixz link=topic=534678.msg3908929#msg3908929 date=1328493726]
Idk it has come to my attention that people post forums link and stuff etc without permission, but why can’t we make a section were people can show off there server and they advertise it. People can comment on it and rate it. So the owner knows what to fix.
Just an idea! Don’t tell at me
[/quote]
That’s what the server status page is for, and no, we will not be adding an advertisement section.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Advertise section
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“kronixz, post:3, topic:431971”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=534678.msg3908933#msg3908933 date=1328494266]
Or we can have a comment box on the status page (like blogs).
[/quote]
Yea ![/quote]

This has been suggested before. Other server owners can just advertise the fuck out of the top servers and the sponsored servers’ pages.

Read full topic
